name: DELANIE
description: The Delanie elevates modern living with thoughtful design and room to grow. Boasting 2,610 sq. ft., 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, and a 3-car garage with the option for a 4th bedroom or den this home offers both function and flexibility. Its open concept layout brings together expansive living areas and a contemporary kitchen enhanced by custom cabinets and sleek countertops. High ceilings and generous windows fill the space with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Whether you need more room for family, work, or hobbies, the Delanie delivers.
